wikipedia_page.main: Thomas George Owen-Evans (born 18 March 1997) is an English footballer who plays for Hereford as a midfielder.

response: The team competes in the Under-18 Football League Youth Alliance. A number of the academy graduates have progressed to the senior squad including Andrew Hughes, Lee Evans, Regan Poole, Aaron Collins, Tom Owen-Evans, Kieran Parselle and Lewis Collins.
